body_html: Looking at your command lines, it's a little suspicious that the PS tasks (mentioned in the error message) have the arg specified as -task_id=1 (and not --task_id=1). Is it possible that your PS task 1 (i.e. on 10.10.102.29:2220) thinks that it is actually task 0, because this flag isn't being parsed?

body: Looking at your command lines, it's a little suspicious that the PS tasks (mentioned in the error message) have the arg specified as `-task_id=1` (and not `--task_id=1`). Is it possible that your PS task 1 (i.e. on `10.10.102.29:2220`) thinks that it is actually task 0, because this flag isn't being parsed?
